Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.communication

Interface NotificationVisitor

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientSideVisitor, ServerSideVisitor
public interface NotificationVisitor
This interface is used to implement the visitor pattern. Both in client and server side a Notification is filtered by a NotificationVisitor that updates view or model.
